forecast-period.text: Wind gusts can be 40 percent stronger than the averages given here, and maximum waves may be up to twice the height.

Winds: West to southwesterly 15 to 20 knots tending south to southwesterly 10 to 15 knots by midday. Winds turning south to southeasterly below 10 knots in the evening. Seas: 1 to 1.5 metres, decreasing below 1 metre around midday. Weather: Cloudy. 50% chance of showers.

Winds: East to southeasterly 10 to 15 knots tending south to southwesterly in the late afternoon then tending east to southeasterly 15 to 20 knots in the evening. Seas: Below 1 metre. Weather: Mostly sunny.
Winds: Easterly 15 to 20 knots turning south to southeasterly during the afternoon then tending east to southeasterly during the evening. Seas: Around 1 metre. Weather: Sunny.

Winds: Easterly 15 to 20 knots becoming variable about 10 knots during the morning then becoming easterly 10 to 15 knots during the evening. Seas: Around 1 metre, decreasing below 1 metre during the morning. Weather: Sunny.

Winds: Southwesterly 15 to 20 knots easing to 10 to 15 knots in the afternoon, becoming southerly below 10 knots by the evening. Seas: 1 to 1.5 metres, decreasing to 1 metre during the morning. Weather: Cloudy. 50% chance of showers.

Winds: East to southeasterly about 10 knots increasing to 10 to 15 knots in the middle of the day. Seas: Below 1 metre, increasing to 1 to 1.5 metres west of Sandy Point by early evening. Weather: Mostly sunny.
Winds: East to southeasterly about 10 knots increasing to 10 to 15 knots during the afternoon. Seas: Around 1 metre. Weather: Sunny.
Winds: Variable about 10 knots. Seas: Below 1 metre. Weather: Sunny.
Winds: Westerly 15 to 20 knots tending southwesterly 10 to 15 knots by midday then decreasing to about 10 knots in the evening. Weather: Partly cloudy. 50% chance of showers.
Winds: Variable below 10 knots becoming easterly 10 to 15 knots in the evening. Weather: Partly cloudy. 40% chance of showers.

Winds: East to northeasterly 10 to 15 knots becoming east to southeasterly about 10 knots during the morning then becoming northeasterly during the evening. Weather: Partly cloudy. 30% chance of a shower.
Winds: North to northeasterly about 10 knots tending easterly 10 to 15 knots during the day then tending northeasterly during the evening. Weather: Mostly sunny.
